name: relend
content:

to lend again: The bank borrows at low rates of interest and relends at a higher rate. He took out a loan at 12 percent and relent the money at 15 percent. The state will re-lend most of the loan to local businesses. [ + two objects ] The bank is willing to relend me the money at the rate that was originally agreed.
